attributes.action: NOT allow Margaret Thatcher a state funeral under any circumstances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people idolise Margaret Thatcher because of her years as Prime Minister, many still feel great hate towards her for the same reasons. No public figure who is so divisive of public opinion should even be considered for a state funeral, which should be reserved for deceased persons of whom the public's opinion is more uniformly positive.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
